name: Cat's Cajun Dirty Cauliflower "Rice"
author: purplngldkitty
summary: Cajun-style dirty rice made with cauliflower. Great as a side or a main dish!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) bag frozen seasoning blend (onions, celery, and green and red bell peppers)
4 cups shredded cauliflower (such as Green Giant™ Cauliflower Crumbles®)
1 teaspoon Creole seasoning (such as Tony Chachere's®)
1 dash hot sauce, or to taste
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Cook and stir seasoning blend in a large skillet over medium heat until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes
Add cauliflower and garlic; cook and stir until slightly softened, 2 to 3 minutes
Stir cooked ground beef, beef broth, Worcestershire sauce, parsley, Creole seasoning, pepper, garlic powder, onion salt, and bay leaf into the cauliflower mixture
Cook, stirring occasionally, until almost all of the beef broth has been absorbed, 8 to 10 minutes
Stir in green onions and hot sauce
